Detailed Description

SmsUnreadProvider is the provider to retrieve the unread sms from the sim. The message type indicator can both be Statusreport and Deliver. An instance of this class is part of the Apoxi Data Control. A pointer to this provider can be retrieved from the main provider via the id:

c_sms_unread_provider_id

NOTE: c_sms_base_unread_provider_id is used if APOXI_SMS_NEW_PROVIDERS is defined.

Please refer to SmsProvider for possible columns

NOTE: Please do not instantiate this class.
